==== Notes ====

===== Touhpad Notes =====

The touchpad is quite lively after install, scrolling upon the smallest of touches. Adding the
following options to in the relevant '''''InputDevice''''' section of '''''/etc/X11/xorg.conf''''' for
the touchpad will calm it down for normal use.
<pre>
Option "VertScrollDelta" "0"
Option "MaxTapTime" "200"
</pre>

===== Motion eye (integred web cam) =====
Works in Edgy and Feisty with gspa module <nowiki>[[http://mxhaard.free.fr/]]</nowiki>
See in french <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu-fr.org/spca5xx?s=spca]]</nowiki>
